snippet: Remarks by Britain’s chancellor of the Exchequer, George Osborne, on addressing market manipulation in currency trading gives greater clarity to the banking sector, write two Nasdaq OMX executives.
abstract: Remarks by Britain’s chancellor of the Exchequer, George Osborne, on addressing market manipulation in currency trading gives greater clarity to the banking sector, write two Nasdaq OMX executives.

byline.original: By MICHAEL O'BRIEN and BILL NOSAL

headline.main: British Regulator Osborne Takes a Step Forward for Foreign Exchange Oversight
